message: Let's split it 60-40 to start, I'll give you a chance to negotiate
I think a 60-40 split is fairer, let's start with that. We can adjust if you want to make a counteroffer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Let's see if you'll meet me in the middle
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think a 55-45 split is more fair considering the inflation. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
